abstract.t: This document describes how Ethernet Shortest Path Bridging - MAC mode (802.1aq) and (802.1Qbp) can be combined with EVPN in a way that interworks with PBB-MESs as described in the PBB-EVPN solution in a way that permits operational isolation of each Ethernet network subtending an EVPN core while supporting full interworking between the 3 variations of Ethernet operation.
